body.p: Play Contest The Band Mothers are offering a prize for the beat play given at the Play Contest in the high school gymnasium on Friday evening, March 2 The Wittenberg 4-11 club will present the play, "Be Heme at Midnight." in which five high school student will take part. "Chocolate Cream Wedding." is the title of the play that will be given by the Methodist Ladies' Aid. "Between Tram*" will be present* I by the Wittenberg HomemakerS Club PupilS from the Norm School had intended to enter a play, but due to unavoidable circumstances will lie un able to do so, according to their principal, Wilmarth Thayer. There will be several musical specialty number- between the acts. Home made candy will be offered for sale during the evening.
